title: Luxury Flat 97m2 In a classy district of Paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Apartment located in the chic district of the 16th in Paris near the Mirabeau bridge and subway station on the first floor of a freestone building in Haussmman style. The property consists of 2 living rooms, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, ceiling height 2m84. The apartment is in very good condition, no work needed. Collective heating, Guardian. Apparently sunny thanks to a South-East orientation without opposite. The apartment can be modulated if desired by enlarging the rooms. Close to metro, shops, places of worship, schools, sports activities, ...

For more information contact +336 88 04 81 18
